fields.label: Note
fields.instructions: Use <h2> - <h6> tags to mark text headings. Use <b> tag to stylistically offset text and <em> for stress emphasis, i.e., something you'd pronounce differently. For more info on semantic markup see this guide.

fields.label: Image
fields.name: header_image
fields.instructions: Add large high quality image. E.g. 1600 x 1200 px.

sub_fields.label: Image overlay
sub_fields.name: display_image_overlay
sub_fields.instructions: Add an overlay in case header image is too bright.

sub_fields.label: Overlay opacity
sub_fields.name: overlay_opacity
sub_fields.instructions: Choose overlay opacity level. 0.95 — almost opaque, 0.5 — almost transparent.

fields.label: Sidebar content
fields.name: sidebar_content
fields.instructions: Article sidebar can contain multiple objects, however, for aesthetical reasons, its content should not exceed main text height. To reorder objects drag and move entries by the number on the left side.

sub_fields.label: Video ID
sub_fields.name: id
sub_fields.instructions: Enter YouTube or Vimeo video ID. Copy part of the video's URL that contains ID. E.g. http://youtu.be/9D05ej8u-gU.

fields.label: Sources
fields.name: sources
fields.instructions: Add sources and citations. Note: to reorder source items drag by entry number displayed on the left side.

sub_fields.label: Authors
sub_fields.name: authors
sub_fields.instructions: e.g. Clarke, Arthur C.; Simak, Clifford Donald and Bradbury, Ray

sub_fields.label: Editors / translators
sub_fields.name: editors_translators
sub_fields.instructions: e.g. ed. Walter Emil Kaegi Jr. and Peter White

fields.label: Resources
fields.name: resources
fields.instructions: Add resources and additional reading. Note: to reorder resource items drag by entry the number displayed on the left side.

sub_fields.label: Authors
sub_fields.name: authors
sub_fields.instructions: e.g. Clarke, Arthur C.; Simak, Clifford Donald and Bradbury, Ray

sub_fields.label: Editors / translators
sub_fields.name: editors_translators
sub_fields.instructions: e.g. ed. Walter Emil Kaegi Jr. and Peter White
